EmailTemplate.name: RE: Re: Information Needed (1358806687.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Re: Information Needed (1358806687.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tony, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. Im glad to hear you would like to get your account reactivated for your next project. Here are a few important items: - You can access a private informational section about MBO Partners here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html>. - Benefits (401k, Health, Dental, etc) - Sample Contracts - Demo of our Business Center - Value of MBO
- In addition we have an index of recorded Webinars, white papers and collaterals that talk about the best practices for working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. If you have questions, feel free to reach out to me or schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. I look forward to working with you. Have a great evening,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tony Pauletti [mailto:a.pauletti@verizon.net] Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2013 5:06 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Re: Information Needed Monday is fine. Call at 301-742-7296. Thanks, tony @! On 01/17/13, Nicolette Taylor<ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hi Tony, Thank you for reaching out! I apologize I was not able to call you today, my schedule is completely filled. I will be working for only about an hour tomorrow but will be back in the office on Monday. Would you be available Monday sometime? Please let me know what your availability looks like and I look forward to speaking with you. Thank you and have a great day, Nicolette On Jan 17, 2013, at 4:28 PM, "Tony Pauletti" <a.pauletti@verizon.net <mailto:a.pauletti@verizon.net>> wrote:I am a MBO alumnus. I am currently a permanent employee, but I am returning to consulting. I would like to discuss how MBO can support me going forward.Please call at 301-742-7296. Thanks, tony @!<
